articles.title: MAS examining information in Pandora Papers about Singapore-based Asiaciti Trust - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) is reviewing information about Singapore-based firm Asiaciti Trust, which has appeared in a massive leak of financial records dubbed the Pandora Papers
articles.content: Out of the 11.9 million leaked documents, nearly two million came from inside Asiaciti Trust a trust and corporate service provider with operations in Singapore, Hong Kong, the Cook Islands, Dubai, N… [+2774 chars]

articles.title: 1.53m crocodile at Singapore's East Coast Park caught and relocated - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A 1.53m-long crocodile spotted by anglers at East Coast Park on Tuesday (Oct 5) has been caught and relocated to the Sungei Buloh Wetland Reserve.

articles.title: AirAsia Group to only allow fully vaccinated passengers - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia Group Bhd's Malaysian unit will only allow fully vaccinated adult passengers on its flights as it prepares to resume domestic and eventually international flight services, it said on Wednesday.

articles.title: Duterte admin approval rating in fight vs corruption drops 12 points in latest survey - CNN Philippines
articles.description: The Duterte administration’s approval rating in addressing graft and corruption had a double-digit drop of 12 points to 52% based on Pulse Asia’s latest poll.
